title: Train Station Ambiences
description: Selection of iconic British Railway Station, Platform, Concourse & Underground Ambiences
longDescription:
Experience the immersive and authentic soundscape of British train stations with "British Train Station Ambiences”. This diverse collection offers a rich tapestry of atmospheres, allowing you to immerse yourself in the bustling energy of iconic train stations across the UK. From the grandeur of London King's Cross and the vibrant Manchester Piccadilly to the suburban charm of London's Underground and Overground, these recordings encapsulate the true essence of British railway travel.


Whether you're looking for a comprehensive ambience pack to transport your audience to the heart of a train station or you want to layer these sounds with other elements, this collection has you covered. Expand your personal sound library with original and representative train station ambiences that will add depth and realism to your projects.


Drag and drop into your project with seamless looping
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  • 16 Audio Waves, 16 Audio Cues 
  •  44.1kHz, 16bit Audio
  •  Seamless Looping
  • 47.2 Minutes of Audio
  • Mac & WIndows Compatible
